name: Demong Hunter
description:
Toon rendering-based animation style graphics!
Various attack styles of knights, fighters, wizards, and more!
Shoot! Evasion! Special Attack! Enjoy the control and enjoy the SD action.

Demong Hunter is the story of a Hunter trying to Regain Peace by defeating the bug ‘Demong’created by the whole brain in the virtual world.

Enjoy the Battle with Different Special Skills and Unique Attack Style for each Character.

- Enjoy fantasy RPG elements.
- Collecting gold to increase your stats.
- Defeating the boss to collect artifacts for special effects.
- After the normal ending, in order to reach the true ending, you need to clear all stages with a lot of volumes.

We recommend our game to those who
- loves quick battles and cute characters.
- loves speedy action game
- loves various attacks such as swords and arrows!
- loves action games.
